p: The oxysterol 27OHC complexed with 2-hydroxypropyl-β-cyclodextrin (2HP-βCD:27OHC) was kindly provided by Panoxyvir Ltd (Turin, Italy). The anti-RSV monoclonal antibody Ab35958 was purchased from Abcam (Cambridge, United Kingdom). The secondary antibody peroxidase-conjugated AffiniPure F (ab’)2 Fragment Goat Anti-Mouse IgG (H+L) was purchased from Jackson ImmunoResearch Laboratories Inc. (West Grove, PA, USA). The recombinant antibody mSIP-3022 against SARS-CoV-2 Spike was previously described [ 17].
